thread.title: AI to spur growth, help improve life quality: Kerala CM
thread.title_full: AI to spur growth, help improve life quality: Kerala CM

author: FE Bureau
title: AI to spur growth, help improve life quality: Kerala CM
text:
Kerala will strive to emerge as India’s nerve centre of Artificial Intelligence (AI) by leveraging AI tools and systems in all sectors besides making indigenous contributions in the domain, state chief minister Pinarayi Vijayan said here on Thursday.
Inaugurating the country’s first International Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) conclave here, Vijayan said integrating AI into all key sectors including tourism, healthcare, education, IT and renewable energy will stimulate the economic growth and improve the quality of life of people. “The government has identified AI as a focus sector in its new industrial policy. More AI-based investments are anticipated in the state in near future,” Vijayan said.
Also Read Artificial Intelligence: Transforming Banking with Smart Innovations
The two-day event is being organised by Kerala State Industrial Development Corporation (KSIDC) in collaboration with IBM. Around 4,500 participants have registered for the event through online and offline including students and experts from various industries.
Terming the conclave as a milestone event for the country, minister for industries, law and coir, P Rajeeve said the conclave is a platform to explore possibilities like how GenAI can address the real life challenges and to expand the avenues for growth, besides developing tools that can benefit various sectors through our economy and society.
